sourcesContent:
import { useState, useEffect } from "react"
import { makeStyles } from '@material-ui/core/styles'
import Container from '@material-ui/core/Container'
import Box from '@material-ui/core/Box'
import Button from '@material-ui/core/Button'
import Grid from '@material-ui/core/Grid'
import Icon from '@material-ui/core/Icon';
import Typography from '@material-ui/core/Typography'
import FormGroup from '@material-ui/core/FormGroup';
import FormControlLabel from '@material-ui/core/FormControlLabel';
import Checkbox from '@material-ui/core/Checkbox';
import CheckBoxOutlineBlankIcon from '@material-ui/icons/CheckBoxOutlineBlank';
import CheckBoxIcon from '@material-ui/icons/CheckBox';



const useStyles = makeStyles(theme => ({
  root: {
    width: "100%",
    height:70,
    background: "transparent",
    padding:15,
  },
  filter: {
    marginRight:15,
    position:'relative',
    height:'auto',
  },
  popover: {
    position:'absolute',
    top:'calc(100% + 12px)',
    width:300,
    height:'auto',
    zIndex:2000,
    background:"#fff",
    overflow:'visible',
    borderRadius:12,
    boxShadow: '0 4px 6px -1px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1), 0 2px 4px -1px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.06)',
    border:'1px solid #eee',
    padding:20,

    '&::after': {
    	borderWidth: 10,
    	marginLeft: -30,
      bottom: '100%',
	    left: 60,
      content:  '" "',
	    height: 0,
	    width: 0,
	    position: 'absolute',
	    pointerEvents: 'none',
	    borderBottomColor: '#fff',
      border: 'solid transparent',
    },

    '&::before': {
    	borderWidth: 12,
    	marginLeft: -30,
      bottom: '100%',
	    left: 58,
      content:  '" "',
	    height: 0,
	    width: 0,
	    position: 'absolute',
	    pointerEvents: 'none',
	    borderBottomColor: '#eee',
      border: 'solid transparent',
    }

  },

}));

const FilterBar = props => {
  const classes = useStyles()
  const [openFilter, setOpenFilter] = useState(null)

  const [state, setState] = useState({
    checkedA: true,
    checkedB: true,
    checkedF: true,
    checkedG: true,
  });

  const handleChange = (e) => {
    setState({ ...state, [e.target.name]: e.target.checked });
  };


  return (
      <Box className={classes.root} p={1}>
        <Box className={classes.filter} display="inline-block">
          <Button onClick={() => setOpenFilter(1)} variant="outlined" color="secondary">Client: Any<Icon>expand_more</Icon></Button>
          {(openFilter === 1) &&
            <Box className={classes.popover}>
              <FormGroup>
                <FormControlLabel
                        control={<Checkbox checked={state.checkedA} onChange={handleChange} name="checkedA" />}
                        label="Individual"
                        />
                <FormControlLabel
                        control={<Checkbox checked={state.checkedB} onChange={handleChange} name="checkedB" />}
                        label="Couple"
                        />
                <FormControlLabel
                        control={<Checkbox checked={state.checkedC} onChange={handleChange} name="checkedC" />}
                        label="Family"
                        />
                <Button>Save</Button>
              </FormGroup>
            </Box>
          }
        </Box>
        <Box className={classes.filter} display="inline-block">
          <Button onClick={() => setOpenFilter(2)} variant="outlined" color="secondary">Concerns: All<Icon>expand_more</Icon></Button>
          {(openFilter === 2) &&
            <Box className={classes.popover}>
              <FormGroup>
                <FormControlLabel
                        control={<Checkbox checked={state.checkedA} onChange={handleChange} name="checkedA" />}
                        label="Depression"
                        />
                <FormControlLabel
                        control={<Checkbox checked={state.checkedB} onChange={handleChange} name="checkedB" />}
                        label="Stress"
                        />
                <FormControlLabel
                        control={<Checkbox checked={state.checkedC} onChange={handleChange} name="checkedC" />}
                        label="Career"
                        />
                <Button>Save</Button>
              </FormGroup>
            </Box> }
        </Box>
        <Box className={classes.filter} display="inline-block">
          <Button onClick={() => setOpenFilter(3)} variant="outlined" color="secondary">Treatment: All<Icon>expand_more</Icon></Button>
          {(openFilter === 3) &&
            <Box className={classes.popover}>
              <FormGroup>
                <FormControlLabel
                        control={<Checkbox checked={state.checkedA} onChange={handleChange} name="checkedA" />}
                        label="Depression"
                        />
                <FormControlLabel
                        control={<Checkbox checked={state.checkedB} onChange={handleChange} name="checkedB" />}
                        label="Stress"
                        />
                <FormControlLabel
                        control={<Checkbox checked={state.checkedC} onChange={handleChange} name="checkedC" />}
                        label="Career"
                        />
                <Button>Save</Button>
              </FormGroup>
            </Box> }
        </Box>
      </Box>
  )
}

export default FilterBar
